game.name: FLAG-O-TRON
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: FLAGOTRON is a unique flagbuilder roguelike. No cards—just flags and strategy. Place flags, move them with chess pieces, build combos, and battle bosses.
game.shortDescriptionEn: FLAGOTRON is a unique flagbuilder roguelike. No cards—just flags and strategy. Place flags, move them with chess pieces, build combos, and battle bosses.
